kosher.translation[0].definitions[0].def: kosher food is prepared according to Jewish law
kosher.translation[0].definitions[1].def: kosher restaurants or shops sell food prepared in this way
kosher.translation[0].definitions[2].def: something that is kosher is honest, legal, or really what it is claimed to be
kosher.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Are you sure this offer is kosher?
